snippet.title: PAGAN PEAK VR Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it for Oculus Rift: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/2833444230004406/
Get it for Steam VR:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1059430/PAGAN_PEAK_VR/
PAGAN PEAK VR takes you on a journey to the darkest corners of the human mind. You will find yourself alone in a mysterious alpine cabin, captured by the Krampus Killer. Your only chance to survive is to escape the cabin and solve the riddles laid out by the killer, emerging deeper and deeper into his psyche… Find out more at https://www.paganpeakvr.com
